00043 template<unsigned DIM>
00044 class CryptSimulationBoundaryCondition : public AbstractCellPopulationBoundaryCondition<DIM>
00045 {
00046 private:
00047 
00052     bool mUseJiggledBottomCells;
00053 
00055     friend class boost::serialization::access;
00062     template<class Archive>
00063     void serialize(Archive & archive, const unsigned int version)
00064     {
00065         archive & boost::serialization::base_object<AbstractCellPopulationBoundaryCondition<DIM> >(*this);
00066         archive & mUseJiggledBottomCells;
00067     }
00068 
00069 public:
00070 
00076     CryptSimulationBoundaryCondition(AbstractCellPopulation<DIM>* pCellPopulation);
00077 
00085     void ImposeBoundaryCondition(const std::vector< c_vector<double, DIM> >& rOldLocations);
00086 
00094     bool VerifyBoundaryCondition();
00095 
00101     void SetUseJiggledBottomCells(bool useJiggledBottomCells);
00102 
00104     bool GetUseJiggledBottomCells();
00105 
00112     void OutputCellPopulationBoundaryConditionParameters(out_stream& rParamsFile);
00113 };

00137 template<class Archive, unsigned DIM>
00138 inline void load_construct_data(
00139     Archive & ar, CryptSimulationBoundaryCondition<DIM> * t, const unsigned int file_version)
00140 {
00141     // Retrieve data from archive required to construct new instance
00142     AbstractCellPopulation<DIM>* p_cell_population;
00143     ar >> p_cell_population;
00144 
00145     // Invoke inplace constructor to initialise instance
